globalHeaders.Content-Security-Policy: default-src * 'unsafe-inline' 'unsafe-eval' data: blob:; frame-src https://www.youtube.com https://www.youtube-nocookie.com https://player.vimeo.com data: blob: *; connect-src *; img-src * data: blob:; media-src * data: blob:; script-src * 'unsafe-inline' 'unsafe-eval'; style-src * 'unsafe-inline';
